item.description: Hey, this is William👋! I’m a first year Computer Science Student at the University of Toronto. I’m interested in Artificial Intellegence, Cloud Computing, and software development. Personal Life 📖 I was born in Shandong, China. A half pinisula with beautiful oceans and mountains as well as many kind hearted people. This is the birthplace of Confucious and many of acient Chinese culture. Surrounded by this environment, I’m quite interested in 春秋, 孟子, 荀子, and many other classics.
